law.catch_line: Register of applicants to be maintained.

text.section: The register shall be prima facie evidence of all matters contained in the register.
The register shall be kept on file in the office of the board and shall be open for public inspection in accordance with KRS 61.870 to 61.884.

law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 6, effective June 8, 2011.
